name: movementulum
description:
pressing Z increases the rotation speed of your node temporarily, this can also be used to make the base (square) move closer to you

holding Z makes all the other nodes reverse their direction of rotation in differing times

using this, you have to get your node in the target and press Z when youre at it, which will increase your score and add another node to your collective

this was made for the 2018 one button game jam
